listener.description: Adds file hashes to health check
Uses template hooks to spit into templates

phrases.phrase: Albums must contain at least one photo.
All photos, comments, and likes in this album will be removed.
All comments and likes for this photo will be removed.
Likes your comment on a photo
This member limits who may view this album.
This member limits who may view some albums.
No one has liked this photo yet.
There are no photos in this album.
Please enter a name for the album.
Please enter a reason for reporting this photo.
The requested album could not be found.
The requested photo could not be found.
Someone comments on a photo that you have commented on
Someone comments on one of your photos
Someone likes one of your photos
Someone likes your comment on a photo
Thank you for reporting this photo.
The album has been saved successfully.
The cover photo has been changed.
The photo has been saved successfully.
This user has not created any albums.
{username} also commented on {owner}'s photo in the album {album}.
{username} commented on your photo in the album {album}.
{username} has added a new photo album: {album}.
{username} has added a new photo to the album {album}.
{username} has added new photos to the album {album}.
{username} liked your comment on {owner}'s photo in the album {album}.
Are you sure you want to like this comment?
Are you sure you want to like this photo?
Are you sure you want to unlike this comment?
Are you sure you want to unlike this photo?
The maximum number of photos allowed in a single album.

templates.template: • {xen:phrase album_your_albums}

{xen:phrase album_add_album} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_albums}
{xen:phrase album_upload_photos}

{xen:phrase album_albums}

{xen:phrase receive_alert_when_someone}...

  • {xen:phrase album_someone_likes_one_of_your_photos}

  • {xen:phrase album_someone_comments_on_one_of_your_photos}

  • {xen:phrase album_someone_comments_on_a_photo_that_you_have_commented_on}

  • {xen:phrase album_someone_likes_your_comment_on_a_photo}

{xen:phrase album_delete_album_x, 'album={$album.name}'} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_albums} {$album.name}

{xen:phrase album_all_album_contents_will_be_removed}

{xen:phrase album_manage_album}: {$album.name} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_albums} {$album.name}
{xen:phrase album_upload_photos}
{xen:phrase album_albums}
• {xen:phrase album_your_albums}

{xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_albums} {$album.name} {xen:phrase album_upload_photos}

{xen:phrase album_photo_x_of_y, 'current={$photo.position}', 'total={$album.photo_count}'}

{xen:phrase album_previous} {xen:phrase album_next}
{xen:phrase album_added} {xen:if $photo.like_date, {xen:phrase unlike}, {xen:phrase like}} {xen:phrase comment}
  1. {xen:link albums/likes-photo, $photo}
  2. {xen:phrase view_previous_comments}...
{xen:phrase album_from_the_album, 'link_params= href="{xen:link albums/view, $album}"', 'album={$album.name}'}

{xen:phrase album_photo_x_of_y, 'current={$photo.position}', 'total={$album.photo_count}'}

{xen:phrase album_view_full_size} {xen:phrase album_report_this_photo} {xen:phrase album_delete_this_photo}

• {xen:helper bodytext, $comment.message}
    {xen:phrase edit} {xen:phrase delete} {xen:if $comment.like_date, {xen:phrase unlike}, {xen:phrase like}}
    1. {xen:link albums/comment-likes-photo, $photo, "comment={$comment.album_photo_comment_id}"}

{xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:phrase album_photo_comments} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_albums} {$album.name} {xen:phrase album_photos}
  1. {xen:phrase view_most_recent_comments}
    2.
• {xen:phrase view_previous_comments}

<xen:title> {xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:phrase album_delete_photo_comment_by_x, 'username={$comment.username}'} </xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums, $user}">{xen:phrase album_albums}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view, $album}">{$album.name}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view-photo, $photo}">{xen:phrase album_photos}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link albums/comment-delete-photo, $photo, 'comment={$comment.album_photo_comment_id}'}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay"> <dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase delete_comment}" class="button primary" /> <input type="reset" value="{xen:phrase close}" class="button OverlayCloser overlayOnly" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title> {xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:phrase album_edit_photo_comment_by_x, 'username={$comment.username}'} </xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums, $user}">{xen:phrase album_albums}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view, $album}">{$album.name}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view-photo, $photo}">{xen:phrase album_photos}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link albums/comment-edit-photo, $photo, 'comment={$comment.album_photo_comment_id}'}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase message}:</label></dt> <dd><textarea name="message" id="ctrl_message" class="textCtrl Elastic" rows="2">{$comment.message}</textarea></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase save_changes}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title> {xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:if $like, {xen:phrase album_unlike_photo_comment_by_x, 'username={$comment.username}'}, {xen:phrase album_like_photo_comment_by_x, 'username={$comment.username}'}} </xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums, $user}">{xen:phrase album_albums}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view, $album}">{$album.name}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view-photo, $photo}">{xen:phrase album_photos}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link albums/comment-like-photo, $photo, 'comment={$comment.album_photo_comment_id}'}" method="post" class="xenForm">
<dl class="ctrlUnit fullWidth"> <dt></dt> <dd> <xen:if is="{$like}"> {xen:phrase album_you_sure_you_want_to_unlike_this_comment} <xen:else /> {xen:phrase album_you_sure_you_want_to_like_this_comment} </xen:if> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase album_unlike_comment}', '{xen:phrase album_like_comment}'}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" autofocus="true" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:phrase album_members_who_liked_this_comment} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_albums} {$album.name} {xen:phrase album_photos}
{xen:phrase close}

<xen:title> {xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:phrase album_comment_on_photo} </xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums, $user}">{xen:phrase album_albums}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view, $album}">{$album.name}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view-photo, $photo}">{xen:phrase album_photos}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link albums/comment-photo, $photo}" method="post" class="xenForm">
<dl class="ctrlUnit fullWidth"> <dt></dt> <dd> <textarea name="message" class="textCtrl Elastic" rows="2" autofocus="true"></textarea> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase post_comment}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:phrase album_delete_photo_in_album_x, 'album={$album.name}'} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_albums} {$album.name} {xen:phrase album_photos}

{xen:phrase album_all_photo_contents_will_be_removed}
{xen:if {$photo.description}, {$photo.description}, '{xen:phrase album_add_description}'}

<xen:title> {xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:if $like, {xen:phrase album_unlike_photo}, {xen:phrase album_like_photo}} </xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums, $user}">{xen:phrase album_albums}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view, $album}">{$album.name}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view-photo, $photo}">{xen:phrase album_photos}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link albums/like-photo, $photo}" method="post" class="xenForm">
<dl class="ctrlUnit fullWidth"> <dt></dt> <dd> <xen:if is="{$like}"> {xen:phrase album_you_sure_you_want_to_unlike_this_photo} <xen:else /> {xen:phrase album_you_sure_you_want_to_like_this_photo} </xen:if> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase album_unlike_photo}', '{xen:phrase album_like_photo}'}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" autofocus="true" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:phrase album_members_who_liked_this_photo} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_albums} {$album.name} {xen:phrase album_photos}
{xen:phrase close}

<xen:require css="album_manage.css" />
<xen:title> {xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:phrase album_edit_photo} </xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums, $user}">{xen:phrase album_albums}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view, $album}">{$album.name}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view-photo, $photo}">{xen:phrase album_photos}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link albums/manage-photo, $photo}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay" id="albumEditPhoto" data-redirect="on">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt> <label for="ctrl_photo_description">{xen:phrase album_photo_description}:</label> </dt> <dd><input type="text" name="description" value="{$photo.description_raw}" id="ctrl_photo_description" class="textCtrl AlbumDescriptionCounter" /></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" class="button primary" value="{xen:phrase album_save_photo}" /> <input type="button" value="{xen:phrase album_delete_photo}" class="button OverlayTrigger DisableOnSubmit" data-href="{xen:link albums/delete-photo, $photo}"> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title> {xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} - {xen:phrase album_report_photo} </xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums, $user}">{xen:phrase album_albums}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view, $album}">{$album.name}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view-photo, $photo}">{xen:phrase album_photos}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link albums/report-photo, $photo}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase report_reason}:</label></dt> <dd><textarea name="message" id="ctrl_message" rows="2" class="textCtrl Elastic"></textarea></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase album_report_photo}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:helper bodyText, $content.message}
{xen:phrase conversationEnhanced_receiving_members}:

<xen:if is="{$album.permissions.manage}"> <form action="{xen:link albums/set-cover, $photo}" method="post" class="AlbumSetCover"> <label {xen:if '!{$photo.is_cover}', 'class="enabled"'}><input type="checkbox" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" {xen:if {$photo.is_cover}, 'disabled="disabled"'} {xen:checked $photo.is_cover} /> {xen:phrase album_cover_photo}</label> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form> </xen:if>
• {xen:phrase album_albums}
• {xen:phrase loading}...

<xen:if is="{$item.content_type} == 'album' AND {$item.action} == 'add'"> {xen:phrase album_x_has_added_a_new_album_y, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'album_params= href="{xen:link albums/view, $item.content}"', 'album={$item.content.name}' } </xen:if>
<xen:if is="{$item.content_type} == 'album' AND {$item.action} == 'name'"> {xen:phrase album_x_renamed_an_album_from_y_to_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'old={$item.name.old}', 'album_params= href="{xen:link albums/view, $item.content}"', 'new={$item.content.name}' } </xen:if>
<xen:if is="{$item.content_type} == 'album' AND {$item.action} == 'photos'"> <xen:if is="!{$item.single}"> {xen:phrase album_x_has_added_new_photos_to_album_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'album_params= href="{xen:link albums/view, $item.content}"', 'album={$item.content.name}' } <xen:else /> {xen:phrase album_x_has_added_a_new_photo_to_album_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'album_params= href="{xen:link albums/view, $item.content}"', 'album={$item.content.name}' } </xen:if> </xen:if>
<xen:if is="{$item.content_type} == 'album_photo' AND {$item.action} == 'like'"> <xen:if is="{$item.content.photo.user_id} != {$visitor.user_id}"> {xen:phrase album_x_liked_ys_photo_in_album_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'subject'}', 'owner={$item.content.photo.username}', 'photo_params= href="{xen:link albums/view-photo, $item.content.photo}" class="PopupItemLink OverlayTrigger" data-cacheoverlay="false" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'album={$item.content.album.name}' } <xen:else /> {xen:phrase album_x_liked_your_photo_in_album_y, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'subject'}', 'photo_params= href="{xen:link albums/view-photo, $item.content.photo}" class="PopupItemLink OverlayTrigger" data-cacheoverlay="false" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'album={$item.content.album.name}' } </xen:if> </xen:if>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase album_set_cover_photo_for_x, 'album={$album.name}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums, $user}">{xen:phrase album_albums}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view, $album}">{$album.name}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:albums/view-photo, $photo}">{xen:phrase album_photos}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link albums/set-cover, $photo}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay" id="albumSetCover">
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase album_make_cover_photo}" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:phrase album_xs_albums, 'username={$user.username}'} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_add_album}
{$album.name} {xen:phrase album_x_photos, 'photos={xen:number $album.photo_count}'} {xen:phrase album_one_photo}

{xen:if $filtered, {xen:phrase album_member_limits_viewing_albums}, {xen:phrase album_user_no_albums}}
{xen:phrase album_add_album}

{xen:phrase album_xs_albums_y, 'username={$user.username}', 'album={$album.name}'} {$user.username} {xen:phrase album_albums} {xen:phrase album_manage_album}

{xen:phrase album_no_photos_in_album}
{xen:phrase album_upload_photos}

{xen:phrase album_x_liked_your_comment_on_ys_photo_in_album_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'owner={$content.photo.username}', 'photo_params= href="{xen:link albums/view-photo, $content.photo}" class="OverlayTrigger PopupItemLink" data-cacheoverlay="false" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'album={$content.album.name}'}

{xen:phrase album_x_also_commented_on_ys_photo_in_album_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'owner={$content.username}', 'photo_params= href="{xen:link albums/view-photo, $content}" class="OverlayTrigger PopupItemLink" data-cacheoverlay="false" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'album={$content.album.name}'}

{xen:phrase album_x_commented_on_your_photo_in_album_y, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'photo_params= href="{xen:link albums/view-photo, $content}" class="OverlayTrigger PopupItemLink" data-cacheoverlay="false" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'album={$content.album.name}'}

{xen:phrase album_x_liked_your_photo_in_album_y, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'photo_params= href="{xen:link albums/view-photo, $content}" class="OverlayTrigger PopupItemLink" data-cacheoverlay="false" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'album={$content.album.name}' }

{xen:phrase album_x_has_added_a_new_album_y, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'album_params= href="{xen:link albums/view, $content}"', 'album={$content.name}' }

{xen:phrase album_x_photos_in_album, 'photos={$content.photo_count}' }

{xen:phrase album_x_renamed_an_album_from_y_to_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'old={$name.old}', 'album_params= href="{xen:link albums/view, $content}"', 'new={$content.name}' }

{xen:phrase album_x_has_added_new_photos_to_album_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'album_params= href="{xen:link albums/view, $content}"', 'album={$content.name}' } {xen:phrase album_x_has_added_a_new_photo_to_album_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'album_params= href="{xen:link albums/view, $content}"', 'album={$content.name}' }

{xen:phrase album_x_photos_in_album, 'photos={$content.photo_count}' }

{xen:phrase album_x_liked_ys_photo_in_album_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'owner={$content.photo.username}', 'photo_params= href="{xen:link albums/view-photo, $content.photo}" class="PopupItemLink OverlayTrigger" data-cacheoverlay="false" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'album={$content.album.name}' } {xen:phrase album_x_liked_your_photo_in_album_y, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'photo_params= href="{xen:link albums/view-photo, $content.photo}" class="PopupItemLink OverlayTrigger" data-cacheoverlay="false" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'album={$content.album.name}' }
